title: New: Chelsea Burgin – Love Letter
body:
Dear Chelsea,

How are you?

I just heard your track Love Letter so I thought I’d drop you a line so you know how on top of the world it made me feel.

Your intensely delicate vocals and adorable lyrics have me wishing to be the recipient of your beautiful contemplation.

Write back when you get a chance.

Yours irretrievably,

Josh

P.S. I don’t even mind that you didn’t play the guitar yourself.
